flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 227 books were taken, so there are 235 - 227= <<235-227=7>>7 books left.
56 books were brought back on Thursday, so there are 7 + 56 = <<7+56=63>>63 books in the library.
Finally, 35 books are taken out on Friday, leaving 63 - 35 = <<28=28>>28 books available.
#### 28

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
